stone-pickaxe.name: Stone Pickaxe
stone-pickaxe.description: A pickaxe made of stone. Used to mine stone and basic ores.

stone-axe.name: Stone Axe
stone-axe.description: A stone axe. Great for chopping wood and a heavy-hitting melee option.

stone-shovel.name: Stone Shovel
stone-shovel.description: A stone shovel. Best for digging dirt, sand, gravel, and snow.

stone-hoe.name: Stone Hoe
stone-hoe.description: A stone hoe. Used for tilling soil and quickly breaking certain plant blocks.

stone-sword.name: Stone Sword
stone-sword.description: A stone sword. A basic melee weapon.

wooden-pickaxe.name: Wooden Pickaxe
wooden-pickaxe.description: A basic pickaxe made of wood. Used to mine stone and coal.

wooden-axe.name: Wooden Axe
wooden-axe.description: A wooden axe. Useful for chopping wood and as a slow melee weapon.

wooden-shovel.name: Wooden Shovel
wooden-shovel.description: A wooden shovel. Used for digging dirt, sand, gravel, and snow.

wooden-hoe.name: Wooden Hoe
wooden-hoe.description: A wooden hoe. Used for farming and breaking plants faster.

wooden-sword.name: Wooden Sword
wooden-sword.description: A wooden sword. A weak melee weapon, often a first step for new players.

iron-pickaxe.name: Iron Pickaxe
iron-pickaxe.description: An iron pickaxe. Can mine nearly all ores including diamond and redstone.

iron-axe.name: Iron Axe
iron-axe.description: An iron axe. Faster at chopping wood and powerful in combat.

iron-shovel.name: Iron Shovel
iron-shovel.description: An iron shovel. Faster at digging and with solid durability.

iron-hoe.name: Iron Hoe
iron-hoe.description: An iron hoe. Useful for farming and breaking plants faster.

iron-sword.name: Iron Sword
iron-sword.description: An iron sword. Reliable mid-game melee weapon.

golden-pickaxe.name: Golden Pickaxe
golden-pickaxe.description: A gold pickaxe. Extremely fast but fragile. Same mining level as wood (cannot mine iron, redstone, diamond, etc.).

golden-axe.name: Golden Axe
golden-axe.description: A gold axe. Very fast at chopping but breaks quickly; decent melee burst.

golden-shovel.name: Golden Shovel
golden-shovel.description: A gold shovel. Extremely fast on dirt-like blocks but with very low durability.

golden-hoe.name: Golden Hoe
golden-hoe.description: A gold hoe. Super snappy for plants; mainly for farming or speed-stripping leaves.

golden-sword.name: Golden Sword
golden-sword.description: A gold sword. Low damage and durability, but enchants very well.

diamond-pickaxe.name: Diamond Pickaxe
diamond-pickaxe.description: A diamond pickaxe. Essential for mining obsidian and very durable.

diamond-axe.name: Diamond Axe
diamond-axe.description: A diamond axe. Durable and powerful, effective both for chopping wood and melee combat.

diamond-shovel.name: Diamond Shovel
diamond-shovel.description: A diamond shovel. Durable and efficient for digging.

diamond-hoe.name: Diamond Hoe
diamond-hoe.description: A diamond hoe. Nearly unbreakable, useful for farming and stripping leaves quickly.

diamond-sword.name: Diamond Sword
diamond-sword.description: A diamond sword. Strong melee weapon with high durability.

netherite-pickaxe.name: Netherite Pickaxe
netherite-pickaxe.description: A netherite pickaxe. Stronger and more durable than diamond, resistant to fire and lava.

netherite-axe.name: Netherite Axe
netherite-axe.description: A netherite axe. High-damage melee weapon and efficient woodcutter.

netherite-shovel.name: Netherite Shovel
netherite-shovel.description: A netherite shovel. Extremely durable and fast for digging.

netherite-hoe.name: Netherite Hoe
netherite-hoe.description: A netherite hoe. Ultra-durable for farming and breaking plants.

netherite-sword.name: Netherite Sword
netherite-sword.description: A netherite sword. Strongest melee weapon, with high durability and fire resistance.

bow.name: Bow
bow.description: A ranged weapon that fires arrows. Can be enchanted with Power, Flame, Infinity, and more.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.description: A ranged weapon that shoots arrows or fireworks. Slower than a bow but more powerful.

trident.name: Trident
trident.description: A powerful melee and ranged weapon. Cannot be crafted; obtained by killing drowned mobs.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: A defensive tool that blocks most attacks. Can be decorated with banners.

flint-and-steel.name: Flint and Steel
flint-and-steel.description: A utility tool used to start fires and ignite TNT or Nether portals.

fishing-rod.name: Fishing Rod
fishing-rod.description: Used to catch fish and treasure from water. Can also hook mobs and items.

shears.name: Shears
shears.description: A tool for shearing sheep, harvesting leaves, beehives, and cobwebs.

compass.name: Compass
compass.description: Points toward the world spawn. Used in cartography recipes.

clock.name: Clock
clock.description: Displays the time of day. Useful in underground builds.

golden-helmet.name: Golden Helmet
golden-helmet.description: High enchantability; piglins won’t attack if you wear any gold piece.

golden-boots.name: Golden Boots
golden-boots.description: Wear any gold armor to pacify piglins.

diamond-boots.name: Diamond Boots
diamond-boots.description: Endgame boots; great for Depth Strider/Frost Walker.

netherite-helmet.name: Netherite Helmet
netherite-helmet.description: Upgraded from diamond. Fire- and lava-resistant item with higher toughness.

netherite-chestplate.name: Netherite Chestplate
netherite-chestplate.description: Highest protection in the game, with extra toughness and knockback resistance.

netherite-leggings.name: Netherite Leggings
netherite-leggings.description: Top-tier leg armor with toughness and knockback resistance.

netherite-boots.name: Netherite Boots
netherite-boots.description: Ultra-durable boots. Pair with Soul Speed or Depth Strider.

turtle-shell.name: Turtle Shell
turtle-shell.description: Helmet crafted from scutes. Grants brief Water Breathing when underwater.

elytra.name: Elytra
elytra.description: Wings that allow gliding. Found in End Cities (ships). Repair with Phantom Membrane or Mending.

crafting-table.name: Crafting Table
crafting-table.description: Unlocks the 3×3 crafting grid for advanced recipes.

furnace.name: Furnace
furnace.description: Smelts ores and cooks food. Accepts fuel (coal, charcoal, etc.).

blast-furnace.name: Blast Furnace
blast-furnace.description: Smelts ores twice as fast as a furnace. Uses fuel.

smoker.name: Smoker
smoker.description: Cooks food twice as fast as a furnace. Uses fuel.

anvil.name: Anvil
anvil.description: Repairs and combines items; applies enchanted books. Slowly degrades with use.

grindstone.name: Grindstone
grindstone.description: Repairs items (without XP) and removes all enchantments for XP.

stonecutter.name: Stonecutter
stonecutter.description: Precise stone-cutting with 1:1 conversions (stairs, slabs, etc.).

smithing-table.name: Smithing Table
smithing-table.description: Upgrades diamond gear to netherite (requires smithing template).

enchanting-table.name: Enchanting Table
enchanting-table.description: Enchants gear using XP and lapis. Bookshelves increase level cap.

brewing-stand.name: Brewing Stand
brewing-stand.description: Brews potions using blaze powder fuel and ingredients.

fletching-table.name: Fletching Table
fletching-table.description: Villager workstation (Fletcher). No player function (as of current versions).

cauldron.name: Cauldron
cauldron.description: Holds water, lava, or potion; used for dyeing and powder snow collection (Bedrock also cleans banners).

chest.name: Chest
chest.description: 16×9 storage slots. Place two adjacent to make a large chest.

ender-chest.name: Ender Chest
ender-chest.description: Personal, linked storage across the world and dimensions.

shulker-box.name: Shulker Box
shulker-box.description: Portable storage that keeps its contents when broken. Dyable variants.

hopper.name: Hopper
hopper.description: Transfers items between containers; picks up item entities.

wheat-seeds.name: Wheat Seeds
wheat-seeds.description: Seeds used to grow wheat on farmland.

wheat.name: Wheat
wheat.description: Harvested from wheat crops. Used in bread and animal breeding.

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.description: Edible crop that can be planted directly.

golden-carrot.name: Golden Carrot
golden-carrot.description: High-saturation food; used in brewing Night Vision.

potato.name: Potato
potato.description: Edible crop; cook for better hunger.

beetroot.name: Beetroot
beetroot.description: Crop item; craft into beetroot soup or red dye.

pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
pumpkin.description: Harvested crop; can be carved or cooked into pie.

pumpkin-pie.name: Pumpkin Pie
pumpkin-pie.description: A filling dessert made from pumpkin, sugar, and an egg.

melon-slice.name: Melon Slice
melon-slice.description: Food item from melons; craft into seeds or blocks.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: Common fruit dropped from oak/cherry leaves.

golden-apple.name: Golden Apple
golden-apple.description: Grants Regeneration and Absorption; great for combat.

enchanted-golden-apple.name: Enchanted Golden Apple
enchanted-golden-apple.description: Rare loot only; grants powerful buffs.

mushroom-stew.name: Mushroom Stew
mushroom-stew.description: Shapeless stew using one red and one brown mushroom.

honey-bottle.name: Honey Bottle
honey-bottle.description: Collected from beehives with a glass bottle; cures poison.

bucket.name: Bucket
bucket.description: Carries water, lava, milk, and fish.

milk-bucket.name: Milk Bucket
milk-bucket.description: Obtained by using a bucket on a cow; removes status effects.

sugar.name: Sugar
sugar.description: Ingredient from sugar cane; used in cake and pumpkin pie.

bone-meal.name: Bone Meal
bone-meal.description: Fertilizer used to grow crops instantly and craft white dye.

redstone-dust.name: Redstone Dust
redstone-dust.description: Redstone wiring used to power and connect components.

redstone-torch.name: Redstone Torch
redstone-torch.description: A constant power source that can be inverted.

redstone-block.name: Block of Redstone
redstone-block.description: Solid block that provides constant power.

repeater.name: Redstone Repeater
repeater.description: Delays signals and prevents backflow; can extend signal.

comparator.name: Redstone Comparator
comparator.description: Compares/subtracts signal strengths; reads container block states.

sticky-piston.name: Sticky Piston
sticky-piston.description: Pushes and pulls a block using slime.

observer.name: Observer
observer.description: Detects block/state updates in front and emits a 1-tick pulse.

dispenser.name: Dispenser
dispenser.description: Dispenses or uses items with contextual behavior (arrows, water, shears, etc.).

dropper.name: Dropper
dropper.description: Drops items as entities when powered; can feed containers.

oak-button.name: Oak Button
oak-button.description: Momentary input; longer pulse than stone.

stone-pressure-plate.name: Stone Pressure Plate
stone-pressure-plate.description: Detects players & mobs; emits when pressed.

heavy-weighted-pressure-plate.name: Heavy Weighted Pressure Plate
heavy-weighted-pressure-plate.description: Outputs analog signal based on entities/items (iron).

light-weighted-pressure-plate.name: Light Weighted Pressure Plate
light-weighted-pressure-plate.description: Outputs analog signal based on entities/items (gold).

daylight-sensor.name: Daylight Detector
daylight-sensor.description: Outputs analog signal based on sunlight; can be inverted.

note-block.name: Note Block
note-block.description: Plays notes; pitch set by clicks; instrument depends on block beneath.

target-block.name: Target
target-block.description: Emits redstone when hit by projectiles; strength based on accuracy.

tripwire-hook.name: Tripwire Hook
tripwire-hook.description: Used with string to make tripwires.

detector-rail.name: Detector Rail
detector-rail.description: Acts as a pressure plate for minecarts; outputs redstone.

activator-rail.name: Activator Rail
activator-rail.description: Triggers on passing carts (ejects riders, activates TNT minecarts).

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: The basic building block of the Overworld. Mined with a pickaxe.

cobblestone.name: Cobblestone
cobblestone.description: Obtained by mining stone. Used in many crafting recipes.

stone-bricks.name: Stone Bricks
stone-bricks.description: Decorative stone block made from stone.

oak-log.name: Oak Log
oak-log.description: Basic wood log. Used for planks, charcoal, and decoration.

oak-planks.name: Oak Planks
oak-planks.description: Versatile building block crafted from logs.

glass.name: Glass
glass.description: Transparent decorative block. Smelted from sand.

bricks.name: Bricks
bricks.description: Decorative block crafted from clay bricks.

terracotta.name: Terracotta
terracotta.description: Hardened clay. Dyable with 16 color variants.

concrete.name: Concrete
concrete.description: Solid, vibrant-colored building block. Created by hydrating concrete powder.

concrete-powder.name: Concrete Powder
concrete-powder.description: Falls like sand; turns into concrete when in contact with water.

quartz-block.name: Block of Quartz
quartz-block.description: Smooth white block crafted from nether quartz.

sandstone.name: Sandstone
sandstone.description: Block crafted from sand, with many decorative variants.

nether-bricks.name: Nether Bricks
nether-bricks.description: Crafted from smelted netherrack. Used in Nether fortresses.

end-stone-bricks.name: End Stone Bricks
end-stone-bricks.description: Decorative block made from end stone.

bed.name: Bed
bed.description: Sleep to skip the night and set spawn point. Comes in 16 colors.

bookshelf.name: Bookshelf
bookshelf.description: Decorative and boosts enchanting power when placed near an enchanting table.

ladder.name: Ladder
ladder.description: Climbable block placed on vertical surfaces.

lantern.name: Lantern
lantern.description: Bright light source that can hang from ceilings or sit on blocks.

soul-lantern.name: Soul Lantern
soul-lantern.description: Blue-tinted lantern crafted with a soul torch. Lower light level; repels piglins.

campfire.name: Campfire
campfire.description: Light source that cooks up to 4 food items and produces smoke signals.

soul-campfire.name: Soul Campfire
soul-campfire.description: Blue fire variant that deals more damage and lower light; crafted with soul soil/sand.

banner.name: Banner
banner.description: Tall decorative flag. Design with patterns using a loom; 16 base colors.

painting.name: Painting
painting.description: Wall-hanging art with randomized motifs and sizes.

glass-bottle.name: Glass Bottle
glass-bottle.description: Used to hold water, potions, and dragon’s breath.

water-bottle.name: Water Bottle
water-bottle.description: Base bottle for brewing. Fill a glass bottle in water or a cauldron.

nether-wart.name: Nether Wart
nether-wart.description: Primary brewing reagent; grows in the Nether.

awkward-potion.name: Awkward Potion
awkward-potion.description: The standard base for most positive and neutral potions.

blaze-powder.name: Blaze Powder
blaze-powder.description: Fuel for brewing stands; also used in strength potions.

spider-eye.name: Spider Eye
spider-eye.description: Ingredient for Poison; fermented for negative/inversion effects.

fermented-spider-eye.name: Fermented Spider Eye
fermented-spider-eye.description: Inverts/negates certain potions (e.g., Night Vision → Invisibility).

phantom-membrane.name: Phantom Membrane
phantom-membrane.description: Ingredient for Slow Falling; repairs elytra.

dragons-breath.name: Dragon’s Breath
dragons-breath.description: Converts splash potions to Lingering variants.

potion-healing.name: Potion of Healing
potion-healing.description: Instantly restores health (level depends on glowstone).

potion-fire-resistance.name: Potion of Fire Resistance
potion-fire-resistance.description: Immunity to fire and lava damage.

potion-night-vision.name: Potion of Night Vision
potion-night-vision.description: Brightens vision in darkness and underwater.

potion-invisibility.name: Potion of Invisibility
potion-invisibility.description: Makes the player invisible (armor & held items still visible).

potion-slow-falling.name: Potion of Slow Falling
potion-slow-falling.description: Negates fall damage and slows descent.

potion-poison.name: Potion of Poison
potion-poison.description: Deals damage over time (won’t kill at level I).

potion-harming.name: Potion of Harming
potion-harming.description: Instant damage; created by inverting Healing or Poison.

zombie.name: Zombie
zombie.description: Common undead hostile that burns in sunlight. Can convert villagers.

creeper.name: Creeper
creeper.description: Silent exploder; drops music discs if killed by a skeleton.

drops.note: Only charged creeper kills another creeper

spider.name: Spider
spider.description: Climbs walls; neutral at high light levels.

enderman.name: Enderman
enderman.description: Teleports and becomes hostile when looked at or attacked; picks up blocks.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Throws harmful potions; drinks buffs to survive.

slime.name: Slime
slime.description: Splits into smaller slimes when killed; spawns in slime chunks and swamps.

cow.name: Cow
cow.description: Passive bovine; source of leather, beef, and milk.

sheep.name: Sheep
sheep.description: Passive; can be sheared for wool. Regrows wool by eating grass.

pig.name: Pig
pig.description: Passive; mounts with a saddle and carrot on a stick.

chicken.name: Chicken
chicken.description: Passive; lays eggs periodically and can be bred with seeds.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Flying hostile found in Nether fortresses; shoots fire.

ghast.name: Ghast
ghast.description: Large floating mob that shoots explosive fireballs.

wither-skeleton.name: Wither Skeleton
wither-skeleton.description: Tall skeleton variant with wither effect on hit.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Ocean Monument defender with a laser attack and thorns.

ender-dragon.name: Ender Dragon
ender-dragon.description: Final boss of the End dimension; defeating it spawns an exit portal and an End gateway.

oak-boat.name: Oak Boat
oak-boat.description: Basic boat for water travel. Holds up to 2 entities. Each wood type has a variant.

oak-chest-boat.name: Oak Boat with Chest
oak-chest-boat.description: Boat variant with storage chest. Each wood type has a variant.

minecart.name: Minecart
minecart.description: Basic vehicle for rails. Can link with variants (chest, hopper, TNT, command block in creative).

minecart-hopper.name: Minecart with Hopper
minecart-hopper.description: Pulls items into hopper while moving on rails.

minecart-tnt.name: Minecart with TNT
minecart-tnt.description: Explosive variant; ignites by activator rail or damage.

rail.name: Rail
rail.description: Standard rail for minecart travel. Can turn corners.

detector-rail.name: Detector Rail
detector-rail.description: Emits redstone when minecart passes over.

activator-rail.name: Activator Rail
activator-rail.description: Triggers carts passing (ejects passengers, ignites TNT carts).

saddle.name: Saddle
saddle.description: Equippable on pigs, striders, and horses. Loot only.

carrot-on-a-stick.name: Carrot on a Stick
carrot-on-a-stick.description: Controls saddled pigs. Consumes durability on use.

warped-fungus-on-a-stick.name: Warped Fungus on a Stick
warped-fungus-on-a-stick.description: Controls striders in the Nether. Consumes durability on use.

coal-ore.name: Coal Ore
coal-ore.description: Ore that drops coal when mined (or XP with Silk Touch).

coal.name: Coal
coal.description: Common fuel used in furnaces and torches.

iron-ore.name: Iron Ore
iron-ore.description: Overworld ore dropping raw iron when mined.

raw-iron.name: Raw Iron
raw-iron.description: Dropped from iron ore. Smelt into ingots.

iron-ingot.name: Iron Ingot
iron-ingot.description: Refined iron, used in most crafting recipes.

raw-gold.name: Raw Gold
raw-gold.description: Dropped from gold ore. Smelt into ingots.

gold-ingot.name: Gold Ingot
gold-ingot.description: Refined gold, used for tools, armor, and powered rails.

diamond-ore.name: Diamond Ore
diamond-ore.description: Rare ore that drops diamonds when mined.

diamond.name: Diamond
diamond.description: Gem used for high-tier tools, armor, and enchanting table.

netherite-ingot.name: Netherite Ingot
netherite-ingot.description: Endgame upgrade material crafted from scraps + gold.

lapis-ore.name: Lapis Lazuli Ore
lapis-ore.description: Ore dropping lapis lazuli, used for enchanting and dyes.

lapis-lazuli.name: Lapis Lazuli
lapis-lazuli.description: Used as a dye and in enchanting.

redstone-ore.name: Redstone Ore
redstone-ore.description: Ore dropping redstone dust, used in circuitry.

quartz-ore.name: Nether Quartz Ore
quartz-ore.description: Nether ore dropping quartz, used in redstone and decoration.

ancient-debris.name: Ancient Debris
ancient-debris.description: Rare Nether block smelted into netherite scraps.

netherite-scrap.name: Netherite Scrap
netherite-scrap.description: Obtained by smelting ancient debris. Used in crafting netherite ingots.

jukebox.name: Jukebox
jukebox.description: Plays music discs. Insert one disc at a time.

music-disc-13.name: Music Disc (13)
obtain: Dropped when a skeleton kills a creeper

music-disc-wait.name: Music Disc (wait)
music-disc-wait.description: Chill C418 piece (aka “where are we now”).

music-disc-pigstep.name: Music Disc (Pigstep)
music-disc-pigstep.description: Upbeat nether track by Lena Raine.

disc-fragment-5.name: Disc Fragment (5)
disc-fragment-5.description: Combine 9 fragments to craft Music Disc 5.

music-disc-5.name: Music Disc (5)
music-disc-5.description: Ambient/story-like disc by Samuel Åberg. Crafted from fragments.

oak-log.name: Oak Log
oak-log.description: Basic log from oak trees. Can be stripped with an axe.

stripped-oak-log.name: Stripped Oak Log
stripped-oak-log.description: Oak log with bark removed using an axe.

oak-planks.name: Oak Planks
oak-planks.description: Versatile block crafted from oak logs.

oak-stairs.name: Oak Stairs
oak-stairs.description: Wooden stairs variant of oak planks.

oak-fence.name: Oak Fence
oak-fence.description: Barrier block crafted from planks and sticks.

oak-fence-gate.name: Oak Fence Gate
oak-fence-gate.description: Fence opening block, toggled with redstone or manually.

oak-trapdoor.name: Oak Trapdoor
oak-trapdoor.description: Wooden hatch for floors and ceilings.

oak-button.name: Oak Button
oak-button.description: Redstone input item; short pulse when pressed.

oak-pressure-plate.name: Oak Pressure Plate
oak-pressure-plate.description: Emits redstone when stepped on by entities.

oak-sign.name: Oak Sign
oak-sign.description: Sign for text. Comes in 16 dyeable text colors.

oak-hanging-sign.name: Oak Hanging Sign
oak-hanging-sign.description: Hanging variant of signs, placed under blocks or chains.
